work-item.field:
In a default Polarion configuration the project role: project_user doesn´t have any write access to Polarion repository. We want project_users to be able to create work items and documents.
  • Goto User Managment > Access Management
  • Select your project folder
  • Give project_user "Read&Write" access in Roles Assignment
  • Try to create a work item with your project_user. It shouldn´t be possible because you didn´t add permissions to create work items yet.
Change Access Management for your project_user
